original_title: Angelo Tsarouchas: A Night in Athens Comedy Show
overview: Award winning comedian Angelo Tsarouchas’ latest one-hour comedy special takes him back to his ancestral home as he performs for a sold out audience in Athens, Greece. No other westernized comedian has ever done this before! Recorded live, “A Night In Athens”, takes you on a funny ride as he entertains you with stories of the challenges of growing up Greek in the diaspora and shares his experiences combining the Greek and Western cultures he lovingly refers to as Grenglish.
title: Angelo Tsarouchas: A Night in Athens Comedy Show
